title: ROOMASSALA tourists attraction land for sale
details:
This bare land is situated at Roomassala mountain. A natural shady and forest land. quite and calm place.. if build a two or three storied building ocean and southern highway and sky view can be seen.
good access to the land. water and electricity.
500 meters to Southern highway entrance at Dewata.
1.5 km to Galle town, fort, railway station,hospitals, pharmacies, and super markets.
clear deeds and survey plans.
Bank loan can be arrange
